moves.1. e4: Interesting win after blunder by White.
moves.1... d6 2. f4 e5 3. d4 exd4 4. Qxd4 Nc6: I noticed that the DB showed White winning from this point but only because Black played poorly.
moves.7... f5 8. Nc3 fxe4 9. Nxe4 Qe7: The DB recommended ...Nf6? with advantage White but this is far stronger.
moves.13... O-O-O 14. Re1 Qa4 15. b3 Qa6 16. B: White hoped for counterplay on the open files, but this forces a lost ending.
